# because

### Bayesian Estimation of Causal Effects ![](reference/figures/because_hex.svg)

**because** provides a unified framework for specifying and fitting
Bayesian structural equation models using
[JAGS](http://mcmc-jags.sourceforge.net).

> **Please beware that this package and its functions are still in
> beta.** Functionality may change, and bugs may occur â€” feedback is
> very welcome!

## Features

**because** simplifies the process of running complex Bayesian
Structural Equation Models by automatically generating JAGS code from
standard R formulas. Key features include:

- **Automatic JAGS Code Generation**: Builds models directly from a list
  of structural equations.
- **Generalized Covariance Structures**: Supports standard SEMs,
  Phylogenetic SEMS (PhyBaSE) as well as Spatial SEMs and Animal Models
  via custom covariance matrices or pedigrees.
- **Phylogenetic Uncertainty**: Incorporates uncertainty by sampling
  across a set of trees.
- **Missing Data Support**: Handles missing values in both response and
  predictor variables using phylogenetic imputation.
- **Measurement Error**: Accounts for within-species variability or
  measurement error.
- **Multiple Response Distributions**: Supports Gaussian, Binomial,
  Multinomial, Ordinal, Poisson, and Negative Binomial distributions.
- **Categorical Predictors**: Automatic handling of factor variables
  with dummy variable expansion.
- **Latent Variables**: Support for modeling induced correlations from
  latent common causes.
- **Model Validation**: Tools for d-separation testing to validate
  causal hypotheses.
- **Parallel Computing**: Run MCMC chains in parallel on multi-core
  systems for faster computation.

## Installation

To install the **stable release** (`v0.9.5`), run:

``` r
remotes::install_github("achazhardenberg/because@v0.9.5", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

To install the **latest development version** (unstable), run:

``` r
remotes::install_github("achazhardenberg/because", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Prerequisites

Before using phybaseR, you need to have **JAGS** (Just Another Gibbs
Sampler) installed on your machine.

- **macOS**: `brew install jags` or download from
  [SourceForge](http://mcmc-jags.sourceforge.net).
- **Windows**: Download installer from
  [SourceForge](http://mcmc-jags.sourceforge.net).
- **Linux**: `sudo apt-get install jags`.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`RhinoMulti.dat`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/RhinoMulti.dat.md)
  : Rhinograd Simulated Repeated Measures Data
- [`RhinoMulti_se.dat`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/RhinoMulti_se.dat.md)
  : Rhinograd Means and Standard Errors
- [`because()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because.md)
  : Run a Phylogenetic Bayesian Structural Equation model (Because)
- [`because_compare()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_compare.md)
  : Compare Because Models
- [`because_dsep()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_dsep.md)
  : Extract d-separation statements from a structural equation model
- [`because_format_data()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_format_data.md)
  : Format Data for Because Analysis
- [`because_lambda()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_lambda.md)
  : Calculate Pagel's Lambda from Variance Components
- [`because_loo()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_loo.md)
  : Calculate LOO-CV for a Because Model
- [`because_loo_compare()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_loo_compare.md)
  : Compare Models Using LOO-CV
- [`because_model()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_model.md)
  : Generate a JAGS model string for Phylogenetic Bayesian SEM (Because)
- [`because_waic()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/because_waic.md)
  : Calculate WAIC with Standard Errors for a Because Model
- [`extract_imputed()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/extract_imputed.md)
  : Extract Imputed Values for Missing Data
- [`plot_dag()`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/plot_dag.md)
  : Plot DAG from Equations or Fitted Model
- [`print(`*`<summary.because>`*`)`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/print.summary.because.md)
  : Print Summary for Because Model
- [`rhino.dat`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/rhino.dat.md)
  : Rhinograd life-history data
- [`rhino.tree`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/rhino.tree.md)
  : Rhinograd phylogenetic tree
- [`storks`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/storks.md)
  : Data on Stork Populations and Human Birth Rates
- [`summary(`*`<because>`*`)`](https://achazhardenberg.github.io/because/reference/summary.because.md)
  : Summary for Because Model
